template.name: Template jboss jvm data
template.description: Monitor jboss jvm parameters via discovery

item.name: Data source available count
item.description: The available count.

item.name: Data source in use count
item.description: The number of physical connections currently in use.

item.name: Data source max wait count
item.description: The maximum number of threads waiting for a connection.

item.name: Application active sessions
item.description: Number of active sessions

item.name: Application sessions created
item.description: Total sessions created

item.name: Class count loaded
item.description: The number of classes that are currently loaded in the Java virtual machine.

item.name: Class count total loaded
item.description: The total number of classes that have been loaded since the Java virtual machine has started execution.

item.name: Class count unloaded
item.description: The total number of classes unloaded since the Java virtual machine has started execution.

item.name: Memory Heap committed
item.description: The amount of memory in bytes that is committed for the Java virtual machine to use.

item.name: Memory Heap init
item.description: The amount of memory in bytes that the Java virtual machine initially requests from the operating system for memory management.

item.name: Memory Heap max
item.description: The maximum amount of memory in bytes that can be used for memory management.

item.name: Memory Heap used
item.description: The amount of used memory in bytes.

item.name: Memory Non heap committed
item.description: The amount of memory in bytes that is committed for the Java virtual machine to use.

item.name: Memory Non heap init
item.description: The amount of memory in bytes that the Java virtual machine initially requests from the operating system for memory management.

item.name: Memory Non heap used
item.description: The amount of used memory in bytes.

item.name: JVM Uptime
item.description: The uptime of the Java virtual machine in milliseconds.

item.name: Thread count daemon
item.description: The current number of live daemon threads.

item.name: Thread count peak
item.description: The peak live thread count since the Java virtual machine started or peak was reset.

item.name: Thread count
item.description: The current number of live threads including both daemon and non-daemon threads.

item.name: Thread count total started
item.description: The total number of threads created and also started since the Java virtual machine started.

item_prototype.name: GC {#NAME} collection-count
item_prototype.description: The total number of collections that have occurred.

item_prototype.name: GC {#NAME} collection-time
item_prototype.description: The approximate accumulated collection elapsed time in milliseconds.

graph_prototype.name: JVM GC {#NAME} collection-count vs Heap Memory usage

item_prototype.name: MP {#NAME} usage committed
item_prototype.description: The amount of memory in bytes that is committed for the Java virtual machine to use.

item_prototype.name: MP {#NAME} usage init
item_prototype.description: The amount of memory in bytes that the Java virtual machine initially requests from the operating system for memory management.

item_prototype.name: MP {#NAME} usage max
item_prototype.description: The maximum amount of memory in bytes that can be used for memory management.

item_prototype.name: MP {#NAME} usage used
item_prototype.description: The amount of used memory in bytes.

trigger.name: Heap memory used by 80%

trigger.expression: {Template jboss jvm data:system.run[{$DATA_COLLECTOR} {$MANAGMENT_USER} {$MANAGMENT_PASS} {$MANAGMENT_PORT} mbean runtime uptime].last(0)}<180
trigger.name: JVM has just been restarted
